appSettings.title: App Settings
appSettings.description: Configure application preferences and language settings
appSettings.autoSaveDescription: Settings are automatically saved and synced across app restarts.
appSettings.revokeTermsDescription: Clear your terms acceptance and be prompted to accept them again
appSettings.revokeTermsConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke your terms acceptance? You will need to accept the terms again to continue using the app.

apiUrl.serverUrlDescription: Enter your custom API server URL. Leave empty to use the default server.
apiUrl.successMessage: The server URL has been updated successfully. GraphQL connections are now using the new URL.
apiUrl.saveError: Failed to save the server URL. Please try again.

retentionPolicies.title: Media retention rules
retentionPolicies.description: Configure how long media files are stored locally
retentionPolicies.maxCacheSizeDescription: Maximum storage space for media files (in MB). Leave empty for no limit.
retentionPolicies.maxCacheAgeDescription: How long to keep media files (in days). Leave empty for no limit.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Set your preferred timezone for displaying dates and times

language.title: Language
language.description: Set your preferred language for the app interface

dateFormat.title: Date Format
dateFormat.description: Customize how dates and times are displayed in the app
dateFormat.use24HourDescription: Use 24-hour format instead of 12-hour format with AM/PM

autoDownload.title: Auto Download Attachments
autoDownload.description: Automatically download notification attachments for offline viewing
autoDownload.enableAutoDownloadDescription: When enabled, all media attachments will be downloaded automatically. When disabled, a download button will appear for manual download of each attachment.
autoDownload.downloadOnWiFiOnlyDescription: Automatically download only when connected to WiFi to save mobile data

gqlCache.title: Notifications cache
gqlCache.maxStoredDescription: Keep at most this number of notifications in the local cache

importExport.title: Import/Export Notifications
importExport.exportDescription: Export cached notifications with all relations resolved to a complete JSON file
importExport.exportMetadataDescription: Export the metadata.json file used by media-cache
importExport.importDescription: Import notifications from a JSON file
importExport.noNotificationsToExport: No notifications found in cache to export
importExport.confirmImportMessage: This will add {{count}} notifications to your cache. Existing notifications will be preserved.
importExport.invalidFileFormat: Invalid file format. Please select a valid notifications export file.
importExport.failedProcess: Failed to process the imported file
importExport.failedRead: Failed to read the selected file
importExport.failedApply: Failed to apply imported data to cache
importExport.importSuccessMessage: Successfully imported {{count}} notifications into the cache

errors.notificationsArrayNotFound: Invalid file format: notifications array not found

versions.title: Version Information
versions.description: Current versions of the application and its components
versions.reloadErrorMessage: Failed to reload the app. Please try again or restart manually.

cache.title: Cache Management
cache.description: Manage application cache and storage settings

cacheReset.title: Reset Cache
cacheReset.subtitle: Total cache size: {{size}}
cacheReset.mediaDescription: Downloaded images, videos, and audio files
cacheReset.noSelectionMessage: Please select at least one cache entity to reset.
cacheReset.completeResetMessage: This will completely reset ALL cache data including user-deleted media flags. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?
cacheReset.completeResetSuccess: All cache data has been completely reset.

userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.description: Manage your personal information and account settings
userProfile.deleteAccountMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
userProfile.deleteAccountFinalMessage: This is the final confirmation. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted.

oauthConnections.title: Connected Accounts
oauthConnections.connectionError: Failed to connect. Please try again.

userProfile.accountDeletedMessage: Your account has been successfully deleted.

buckets.title: Buckets
buckets.description: Manage your notification buckets and organization
buckets.organize: Organize your notifications with buckets. Create and manage different categories.
buckets.createFirstBucket: Create your first bucket to get started
buckets.bucketNotFoundDescription: The requested bucket does not exist or you don't have permission to access it.

form.editDescription: Update your bucket settings and organization.
form.createDescription: Create a new bucket to organize your notifications.
form.readOnlyWarning: You have read-only access to this bucket. You cannot modify its settings.

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.description: Share this bucket with other users to grant them access to view and manage notifications.
sharing.noShares: This bucket is not shared with anyone yet.
sharing.enterIdentifier: Please enter a valid email address or username.
sharing.shareError: Failed to share bucket. Please try again.
sharing.unshareError: Failed to revoke access. Please try again.
sharing.confirmRevokeMessage: Are you sure you want to revoke access for {{user}}?

delete.modalDescription: Choose an action for the bucket "{{bucketName}}":
delete.confirmDeleteMessage: You are about to delete the bucket "{{bucketName}}". This action cannot be undone and will remove all notifications in this bucket.
delete.confirmRevokeMessage: Are you sure you want to revoke your access to the bucket "{{bucketName}}"? You will no longer be able to view or manage notifications in this bucket.

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: Manage devices that can receive push notifications. Register this device to receive notifications.
devices.noDevicesSubtext: Register this device to start receiving push notifications

item.removeDeviceMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this device? You won't receive push notifications on this device.

editName.title: Edit Device Name
editName.description: Change the name of this device to make it easier to identify

systemAccessTokens.title: System Access Tokens
systemAccessTokens.description: System access tokens allow external applications to access the system API. Keep them secure.
systemAccessTokens.noTokensTitle: No system access tokens created yet
systemAccessTokens.noTokensSubtext: Create your first system token to get started
systemAccessTokens.deleteError: Failed to delete system access token

item.deleteTokenMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this system access token? This action cannot be undone.

form.title: Create System Access Token
form.maxCallsPlaceholder: Maximum number of API calls allowed
form.expirationHint: Leave empty for tokens that never expire
form.requesterHint: Select the user requesting this token
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Optional description of the token's purpose
form.createError: Failed to create system access token
form.tokenCreatedSubtitle: Copy this token now. You won't be able to see it again.

accessTokens.title: Access Tokens
accessTokens.description: Access tokens allow external applications to access your account. Keep them secure.
accessTokens.noTokensSubtext: Create your first token to get started

item.deleteTokenMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this access token? This action cannot be undone.

form.title: Create Access Token
form.description: Create a new access token to allow external applications to access your account securely.
form.expirationHint: Leave empty for tokens that never expire
form.tokenCreatedSubtitle: Copy this token now. You won't be able to see it again.

userSessions.title: Active Sessions
userSessions.description: Manage your active login sessions and security. You can revoke sessions that you don't recognize.

item.revokeSessionMessage: Are you sure you want to revoke this session? The user will be logged out.

notifications.title: Push Notifications
notifications.description: Create and send custom push notifications to your devices with rich content and interactive actions
notifications.warningNotRegistered: ⚠️ Device not registered for push notifications, but notification will still be sent

errors.markAllAsReadFailed: Failed to mark all notifications as read. Please try again.

deleteSelected.title: Delete Selected Notifications
deleteSelected.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected notifications? This action cannot be undone.

automaticActions.title: Automatic Actions
automaticActions.description: Configure actions that will be automatically added to the notification
automaticActions.addMarkAsReadActionDescription: Automatically adds a mark as read action to mark the notification as read
automaticActions.addDeleteActionDescription: Automatically adds a delete action to remove the notification
automaticActions.addOpenNotificationActionDescription: Automatically adds an open action to view notification details
automaticActions.snoozeTimesDescription: Select multiple snooze times (in minutes) for automatic snooze actions

attachments.title: Media Attachments
attachments.hint: 💡 Add image, GIF, video or audio attachments to create rich notifications

settings.localeDescription: Select language for notification text and actions

targeting.bucketRequired: At least one bucket is required to send notifications
targeting.userIdsDescription: Select specific users to send the notification to. If none are selected, the notification will be sent to all authorized users.

actions.title: Action Buttons
actions.iconHint: For iOS: Use SF Symbols names (e.g., house.fill, heart, gear)

tapAction.title: Tap Action
tapAction.description: This action will be executed when the user taps on the notification from the lock screen or notification center.

examples.testBody: This is a test push notification with rich content and action buttons. Test your notification setup!

preview.title: JSON Preview
preview.description: This is the JSON payload that will be sent to the server to create the notification

noWebhooks.message: No webhooks available. Create a webhook first to use {{type}} type.

filters.title: Filters & Sorting
filters.hideReadDescription: Hide notifications that have been read

delete.label: Delete

notificationActions.noActionsAvailable: No actions available for this notification

errors.connectionError: Connection error. Please try again later.

errors.connectionError: Connection error. Please try again later.

emailConfirmation.title: Email Confirmation

errors.title: Error
errors.unknown: An error occurred. Please try again.

setPassword.title: Set Password
setPassword.description: Set a password for your account. This will allow you to log in even without the OAuth provider.

validation.newPasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

errors.title: Error
errors.unknown: An error occurred. Please try again.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a 6-character code to reset your password.

emailConfirmation.title: Email Confirmation
emailConfirmation.description: We've sent you a 6-character confirmation code to your email. Enter the code to activate your account.
emailConfirmation.successMessage: Your email has been confirmed successfully! You can now login to your account.
emailConfirmation.errorMessage: Failed to confirm email. The code might have expired or is invalid.
emailConfirmation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

administration.cannotModifyOwnRoleMessage: You cannot change your own role for security reasons.

validation.fillRequiredFields: Please fill Client ID and Client Secret

legal.acceptanceFooterText: By accepting, you agree to be bound by these terms and policies.

deleteItem.title: Delete Media
deleteItem.message: Do you want to delete this media from cache? You can download it again manually later if still available.

empty.title: No Cached Media
empty.message: Media files will appear here as they are downloaded and cached for offline viewing.

gallerySettings.title: Gallery Settings
gallerySettings.autoPlayDescription: Automatically play videos and audio when viewed
gallerySettings.showFaultyMediasDescription: Show media that had download errors or were deleted

welcome.title: Welcome to Zentik!
welcome.description: We'll guide you through the first steps to start using Zentik to manage your notifications.

bucket.title: Create your first bucket
bucket.description: Buckets allow you to organize your notifications by category. Let's create your first bucket together.

token.title: Generate an access token
token.description: Access tokens allow you to send notifications via the REST API. Let's generate a token for you.

notification.title: Send your first notification
notification.description: Now we'll send a test notification to verify that everything works correctly.

api.title: Use the REST API
api.description: Here's how you can send notifications via the REST API using the generated token.
api.documentationInfo: Detailed information on how to send notifications at this link:
